textBox.richText: Matthias Vanoni just joined the biometrics group at Idiap to work on vascular recognition on the context of the project BEAT. Welcome Matthias ! Matthias Vanoni comes from Franche-Comté (France). He starts a PhD on Vascular Recognition. He is a former officer from the French Gendarmerie and obtained a master degree at the French Officer School Saint-Cyr. He is interested in biometrics and his master thesis was about modeling distortion in fingerprint images, under the supervision of Pr. Ross Arun at West Virginia University (USA).
